text:
They walked further, passing the tents and soldiers who were on watch. The British squad members were led by Gaz, who knew where their tents were.
As they walked, Ghost was the first to speak up. He had been silent the whole time before then, but now he had some questions on his mind.
"What do you think of that captain?" he asked in a low voice, turning to the others.
trans:
그들은 텐트와 보초를 서는 군인들을 지나 좀 더 걸어갔다. 영국 대원들은 텐트의 위치를 아는 가즈의 지휘를 받았다.
걷고 있을 때 고스트가 처음으로 입을 뗐다. 그는 내내 조용히 있었지만, 지금은 몇 가지 의문점이 생겼다.
"대장은 어떤 거 같아?" 그는 다른 대원들을 돌아보며 낮은 목소리로 물었다.
